author: SFWsoft

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a problem where the Weather would not update.

•	Fine-tuning of weather icon background updating.
•	Added weather data caching after watch-face re-open.
•	Preparation for additional time fonts in next release
TWEAK:  Tweaked the Background color functionality for Pebble Round

•	Added Background Color Setting (This might still be a little experimental)
 •	Moved Location label down one pixel for aesthetic reasons
 •	Change font to BOLD for step count when "always show steps" is set for more visibility
 •	Added trimming to registration address in config so that spaces are automatically compensated for

BUGFIX RELEASE

- last release broke the showing of step count, when shaking - FIXED (Thx Christoph for feedback)

BATTERY OPTIMIZATION

- Removed watch logging to minimize Bluetooth comms
- Made minor changes to HA & weather refreshing
- Added HA Status text to API

WEATHER RELEASE

Manual city for weather in city.  This will also be used for sunrise/sunset calculations.  See Openweathermap.org for city list

SERVICE RELEASE:

Fixed clipping issue for bottom bar text, by tweaking positions. Thx for the feedback Christ Wilshaw.

•	Initial state of Bluetooth Icon, was “connected”, now accurate.
•	Problem with Original Pebble/Pebble steel devices & background disappearing on changing of settings, fixed.
•	Configuration was still showing color options for non-color devices.  Hidden now as intended.
•	Weather was not updating in certain instances when another message was being sent/received.  Now more robust.
•	Better handling of connected/disconnected states during update cycles
•	Enhanced icon dithering options when changing colors.
FIX - 1.50 was pointing to BETA config url

COLOR CUSTOMISATION RELEASE! 
 •         Customise Colors.
•	You can now customize the color of most of the elements on the watchface from the configuration screen.
•	This includes graphical elements like icons and background.
 •         Theme Selection.
•	You can choose from three options (Mellow Dots, Liner Laser & Calligraphy).  They are not exactly artistic, but I’ll work on them.
 •         Introduced Trial mode.
•	Putting “trial” in the Key box on the configuration page will give you a 7 day fully functional watchface to see all the features.

WEATHER FORECAST RELEASE! 

•	Completed 3 Day forecast.  On Pebble round this is only TWO days due to space restrictions.
o	Instead of including additonal resources (that take more memory), I spent time writing code that will resize the images I have already. This keeps memory usage and app size down, but it took longer to complete.

MAINTENANCE RELEASE! 
•           Optimized bottom bar text to better suit Pebble Round. Thx Mattias for feedback.
•           Migrated configuration to another host that supports SSL for secure transactions (API).  Yes... you will loose your settings :(

MAJOR RELEASE! 

•       Added Registration
	Purchase a Key. Simply enter your email address, and your own Key (can be anything).
	Will unlock additional options for Bottom Bar.
	Will allow you to use the HA API

•       Added Bottom Bar mode options
	High level of customization now possible.
	See http://sfwsoft.co.za/yawn.html for options and explanation

•       Implemented Beta of HA Api.  See http://sfwsoft.co.za/yawn.html for more infromation
	This is still quite basic.  It relies on polling, but will soon be push oriented after ome rigorous testing.

COSMETICS RELEASE! 

•	Changed battery Icon steps to be 3/6 bars on 50%.  Added shaded bars for inbetween percentages (Time & Round only)
•	Tweaked alignment of step text.... it was off by a pixel or two an bothered me.
•	Added "LOCATION ERROR" as city (above time) when Location cannot be established by phone.

FIXES RELEASE! 

•	Added Enable/Disable Health on configuration page.  If you have health disabled on the pebble, it gives an annoing message every time the watchface opens. Disabling it here will stop that. Thx Joe for this one.

ENHANCEMENTS RELEASE! 

•	Reshuffled configuration page
•	Moved config to final hosting site. YOU WILL UNFORTUNATELY LOOSE YOUR SAVED SETTINGS.
•	Added Vibe on Connection Status change to configuration
•	Added Weather update Frequency to configuration 
•	Added “Always Show Step count” to configuration
•	Added first steps to Automation API (email and password)

CONFIGURATION RELEASE!

* Added Configuration Page
* Show/Hide Bluetooth Icon
* Show/Hide Battery Icon
* Battery Icon Mode - Icon/Percentage/Both
* Temperature Mode - C/F
* Option to hide automation icons until I complete the functionality
Initial release for brave or bored folks

description:
Yet-Another-Watchface-Noob.

Features:
* Bluetooth Status
* Battery Status
* Weather (graphic, current temp, forecast min/max)
* Shake for step count
* Date
* Customizable Bottom bar (MANY options)
* Full color customization

I made this watchface for my own needs.  It's a fully functional (albeit limited) watchface that includes weather and normal Battery and Bluetooth status.  I am working towards making the bottom bar customizable.  My personal need is for it to show statuses for various parts of my home automation system.
It can already show many different options including:
2nd timezone, sunrise/sunset, custom text, 3 day forecast and of course the home automation icons.
All the colors are customizable.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a problem where the Weather would not update.

title: YAWN
